text: @realDonaldTrump China did it for their own country to run the world on one cryptocurrency( e-yuan ). Covid-19 was a great idea to stop cash circulation...I can’t believe how much shit has happened already on the presidential election year. Trump you have a lot of people behind you! Keep it up!!
